name: Lost In Memories GGJ2021
description:
Download non-web version for better performance

This game tells a story of a person going through three stages of his life trying to find his forgotten/lost memories of his life. Why did he lose his memories? Why is he searching for them? You will have to play the game to find out.

Controls:
W - walk forward.
S - walk backward.
A - strafe left.
D - strafe right.
Left mouse button - interact with things.

All 3D models, 2D Art were created during the gamejam
